An Absolute Delight
A north westerly rear yard enjoys afternoon sun on the Deck and gazebo accessed off the open kitchen meals area. The renovated kitchen and light filled living spaces make this updated property a delight to live in and our tenants keeps this home as if its their own. Comprising 3 bedrooms, central bathroom, main lounge flowing into the kitchen meals area, single garage with undercover access to the house, secure yard and alfresco entertaining, an inspection of this home will well and truly impress all buyers looking in this price range!!!!

Address: 52 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Blissful Views of the Golf Course & Bay
This simply stunning dress circle position is a rarity in the Golf Course precinct at Clifton Springs. A substantial vacant block of 741m2 with the potential for that special home for the avid golfer, retiree or family. A block for all seasons.
Ideally positioned for the development of two quality townhouses STCA.
Close to all amenities, the Clifton Springs Boat Harbour, public transport and the myriad of wineries and cafes on the Bellarine. Perfectly positioned to take advantage of expansive views of the fairways with the waters of Corio Bay in the distance. Be quick to secure this outstanding future home site. Dimensions approximately 19m x 40m.

Address: 13 Goondiwindi Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Coastal Charmer
This contemporary weatherboard home sits perfectly positioned on a gentle sloped block with generous upgrades throughout. An intuitive floor plan well suited to a young family, downsizers or holiday house. The welcoming verandah invites you into a central hallway, immediately impressive with new carpets, striking tiles and freshly painted throughout. Further exploration will offer delight in the nooks, crannies and angles of this architectural design. All bathrooms and laundry have been renovated and offer beautiful crisp clean spaces in a fresh stylish palette. A lower level open-plan solar passive kitchen/dining/living domain creates further interest. Enhanced beautifully with a raked ceiling and ambient gas fireplace. The kitchen is spacious and well equipped with quality appliances. A split system a/c and ceiling fans create a comfortable interior climate. The pleasant master bedroom is tucked away and offers an ensuite and WIR. Further bedrooms, with built-in robes, are serviced with a large central bathroom convenient separate WC. A well maintained picturesque garden with fruit trees, an abundance of established plants, and prominent trimmed box hedges evoke idyllic coastal living. Well positioned for proximity to the Foreshore Reserve, Jetty Road shops, schools and sporting facilities. This home is an attractive package – come and take a look! Land size 586sqm approx

Address: 70-72 Beacon Point Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
A Hidden Sanctuary
A home unlike any other tucked away just moments from the bay, with all the local amenities that Clifton Springs and Drysdale have to offer; with an ever deceptive façade your expectations will be exceeded.
Set upon approx. 1353m2 this extremely private property oozes a world of potential for the successful purchaser. This solid brick home offers a free flowing floor plan and a timeless style with exposed brick and a neutral palette throughout. The gardens are 20 years in the making and simply enchanting, spend your afternoons amongst all the birdlife and the exotic plants and bulbs that appear in this unexpected botanical treasure.
Comprising 4 bedrooms the master suite with a lavish walk-in robe and ensuite with shower and toilet, the remaining 2 out of the 3 bedrooms are also equipped with built-in robes and are zoned nearby the separate toilet and main bathroom. A beautiful sitting area with an amazing outlook of the garden is set up before veering into the kitchen that is equipped with gas stove top, near new oven, dishwasher and lots of cupboard space including a large walk-in pantry. The dining area has access onto the wrap around verandah and the living room, rather cosy offers views of the garden, bay and You Yangs; the generous sized laundry with an abundance of storage complete the ground floor. One of the major highlights of this home is the setup of the basement/ studio; this space is versatile with its own entry and can be closed off from the house. The basement/studio has a large bedroom, living area and separate toilet, there is also access to the under house storage; this area would make for the perfect teenagers retreat, home office, possible rental or extremely convenient if you wanted to work from home.
There are two sets of double gates at the front of the property which would allow you to bring in a boat, trailer, multiple cars etc. single carport and a magnificent gardens that surround the entire property which you can enjoy from the wrap around verandah.
Features of the home include; hydronic heating, split system heating and cooling, solar panels, bay views from the living area and garden views from majority of the windows in the home, great storage facilities, water tanks, single carport and completely fenced ensuring privacy. The home is freshly painted with new window furnishings and carpets throughout.
This home is in a prime location, approx.. 550m to the bay and within proximity to all amenities including, schools, shops, clinics, reserves/parks and public transport; the home itself is unlike anything you would have come across its and ideal package for the savvy buyer.
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

A STREET FROM THE JETTY! ENORMOUS GARAGE ( 3.5 CLEARANCE)...PERFECT
Set 500 metres from the boat ramp this 3 bedroom home has been meticulously maintained and updated. Open plan living with meals, kitchen and lounge, bedrooms have BIR'S, central bathroom,separate toilet and laundry. Features include pantry, gas heater, split system, central heating, fans, quality window furnishings, LED lights, outside blinds, dishwasher, stainless steel oven with separate grill and more. Outside spacious undercover area, the garage is just fantastic, room for the big boat, motor home and/or... more. Shops, schools and the best park on the Bellarine just up the road. You must inspect now.

Description:
STUNNING BAY VIEWS, SHORT STROLL TO THE WATER, EXTRA CAR /CARAVAN SPACE.....A FABULOUS BEACH RESIDENCE!
Views of the bay and the You Yangs are obtained from the master bedroom and all 3 living areas offered in this home. Comprising formal lounge, informal open plan kitchen/meals/family room, alfresco living, 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and well designed kitchen. Features include evaporative cooling, ducted heating, gas log fire, reverse cycle air conditioners, dishwasher, pantry and good storage. Landscaped gardens, bay views, generous living, outdoor entertaining space all combine here at No. 47 to create the perfect beach residence. Workshop, storage & car accommodation for 3 are found downstairs, with further off street parking for the boat or caravan.

Address: 14-15 Gange Place Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Modern Luxury with Lifestyle Convenience
With an immaculate street presence, this stunning architecturally designed residence offers superior quality, functionality and modern contemporary living at its absolute finest.
When you head beyond the front garden, you'll walk inside to enjoy the WOW factor and feel a sense of welcome and warmth. The solid red gum timber floors show strength throughout the home, combined with soft quality carpets through this well thought out spacious home.
The clever floor plan set over 4 levels allows for open yet dedicated living areas, which include the central family and dining rooms serviced by a tranquil fireplace with a gas log fire, a separate second living or theatre room opening out onto an undercover balcony.
The spacious quality kitchen is the centrepiece of this wonderful home and features natural granite bench tops, Bosch dishwasher, 600mm Falcon Classic 90 series black retro stove and oven combination and an abundance of storage and bench space.
Four bright generous bedrooms includes the master suite, which boasts a walk-in robe, sleekly designed ensuite with twin vanities and leads out to the undercover balcony with stunning bay views back over to Geelong. The other three bedrooms are complete with built in wardrobes and all bedrooms have ceiling fans installed. The central family bathroom and additional powder room have also been thoughtfully designed and positioned. Car accommodation consists of double remote garage with internal access and for those serious about their wining and dining, the lower level cellar is sure to capture your attention.
Stepping out back you will be impressed with the undercover decked alfresco area, ideal for large family or social gatherings and year round entertaining. The adjacent rear yard is ideal for the kids or pets to roam around.
Other quality inclusions: Square set ceilings throughout, fully insulated walls underfloor and between levels, Rylock double glazed doors windows and west facing tinted windows, LED downlights throughout, evaporative cooling, oil heating, new Rinnai gas instantaneous hot water system, ducted vacuuming throughout, 1.5kwt 8 panel solar system, 27,000lt water tank, garden shedding and front and rear garden watering system.
All of this set on a generous 657m2 approx allotment in a sought after pocket of Clifton Springs, you can easily walk to parks, there are bus stops nearby and if you need schools or golf courses, they're hidden around a few corners. This quiet locale has something for everyone. This is a lifestyle opportunity not to be missed, call today!
Insights: 14-15 Gange Place, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 2/1 High Ridge Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Modern stunner with views of bay and parkland
Stunning modern design and location, with unrivaled views of the bay and the You Yangs. Ever wanted to live on acreage? Now you can without the maintenance. There is direct and private access to the 10 acres council land.
Large kitchen with stone bench top, plenty of storage and modern appliances.
The dining area overlooks the park and is adjacent to the north facing, warm living area complete with gas log fire. The views from the spacious living area are uninterrupted.
The master bedroom also faces north and comes with graciously designed ensuite and walk in closet.
The second bedroom has generous built in robes while the main modern bathroom has double shower.
Sit on the freshly painted deck sampling the local wine in the area and watch the ships pass by.
The outdoor area is landscaped and completed by a relaxing, protected bbq area.
Freshly painted exterior, this property is completed with two split system air con, single garage with extra storage room and extra parking space in the driveway. Call Kurt Van Zyl on 0447 357 858 for an immediate inspection.

Address: 3 Talinga Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Neat, Sweet and Complete
Tucked away in a quiet court location only moments to the beach, boat ramp, schools, shops and all that the Drysdale township has to offer awaits a neat haven.
Comprising 3 bedrooms all with double robes the master with access into the two-way bathroom, his and hers robes and a ceiling fan. A large light and breezy living room equipped with a Coonara wood heater, ceiling fan and split system in the formal dining area before veering into the galley style kitchen with lots of cupboards, gas cooking and pantry. The remaining 2 bedrooms, separate toilet and two-way bathroom complete this neat and tidy package.
Outside is a delight and fantastic for year round entertaining; the large undercover area is equipped with easy to use café blinds, celling fan and power overlooking the beautiful garden. Lose yourself amongst the mature sweeping trees and birds song whilst pottering in the garden filled with beautiful flora, fruitful fruit trees including fig, lime, lemon, orange, apricot, apples and passion fruit complete with a large aviary and fishpond.
Features of the home include heating, cooling, instantaneous Rinnai gas hot water, surround sound in the living room, 2 water tanks 1000L/2000L and NBN ready. The double carport at the front of the home is equipped with power, the second tandem carport has a remote roller door with through access to the oversized single lock up garage and workshop also equipped with power plus a powered garden shed completes this well thought-out garden all situated upon 658m2.
This home is appealing in more ways than one with all that it offers; the location is fantastic being so close to the bay with a choice of beaches no more than 15 minutes away, plenty of wineries to explore and the addition of the ferry terminals to and from the Docklands just 10 minutes away! A fantastic investment or place to call home, you decide what this utterly affordable home can do for you.

Address: 73 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
THE VIEWS ARE FANTASTIC!
Built to the grand proportions of yesteryear, set on 820m2 of land and offering sweeping bay and golf course views, is this well-built family home. You are welcomed into the home via a formal entry hall with stained glass features that make a real statement. To the right of the entry is the 3rd bedroom or study/home office. This room has a robe and vanity. Upstairs the home offers spacious kitchen and meals area with adjoining sun-room or sewing nook with those views! Leading from the kitchen is the formal dining room with built-in bar. The lounge room is generously proportioned with built-in display cupboards and mantle plus expansive windows to take in the view - magnificent both day and night! The master suite is huge and consists of the bedroom, a walk-through robe/dressing room, generous ensuite plus another sun-room with access to the main balcony area that overlooks the bay. A second double bedroom with built-in wardrobe overlooks the private back garden. Entertain the largest of family gatherings in the sheltered outdoor living area. Excellent storage throughout the home, 9' ceilings, solar panels, grey water system & water tanks are some of this propertyâ??s features. The oversized double garage has under-house storage and workshop areas plus internal access into the home. Do not hesitate to inspect this property!

Address: 11 Mirrabooka Drive Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Elevated 2-storey family home with brilliant bay views
You can’t put a price on beautiful bay views filtered through the branches of a mighty ghost gum, so consider it as a gift with this substantial 2-storey brick home with loads of potential. Sitting on a gently sloping block in Clifton Springs, the property reaps the benefits of its prime position and outstanding coastal panorama. From the street, an elevated driveway meets a massive double garage/workshop/storage area - a Mecca for any man who likes cars and tinkering with power tools. Once inside the house, the ground floor presents a compact office/den, a bedroom, a laundry with a small bathroom annex, and a large L-shaped lounge with a brick feature wall, a gas space heater, and views of the terraced back garden. Taking the stairs, the excitement mounts as you reach the lounge/dining room that opens to a substantial north-west verandah - and those marvellous views. Outdoor entertainment is clearly on the menu here, with the constant opportunity of watching activities on the bay and glimpses of the You Yangs, while dining on fine food and perfectly chilled wine. The practical kitchen, with its tiled splashbacks, dishwasher and electric stove, also enjoys the light and warmth of its northern aspect. The master bedroom has a walk-in robe and ensuite with shower, vanity and WC - plus it’s own west facing mini-verandah. Two more bedrooms (one with a ceiling fan) share another bathroom with shower, bath and vanity - and a separate toilet. As it stands, the property is perfectly liveable, but some minor repairs and a lick of paint would transform it into a delightfully comfortable home with many unique and enviable features. Plus there’s scope for major renovations (STCA), with luxury lifestyle possibilities on offer. Walk to shops, parks and the Clifton Springs waterfront, or drive to shopping centres, Bellarine Peninsula wineries and restaurants, coastal towns and beaches, and the bustling city of Geelong.
Insights: 11 Mirrabooka Drive, Clifton Springs VIC 3222 was last sold in 2017 and 4 other 5 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.

Address: 39 Jetty Road Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Secure your slice of coastal living!
Tucked away behind a secure fence you’ll discover this renovated 4-BR family home. Low maintenance living, ideally suited to families, first home buyers, investors or those looking for an appealing holiday home. The light and breezy entrance welcomes you to the hub of the home comprising of kitchen, dining/living area, all flooded with north sun. Oak veneer flooring offers a low maintenance option through this main living zone. Well-appointed kitchen which offers gas cooktop, electric oven, D/W, ample bench space and breakfast bar, adding extra entertaining space. R/C heating and cooling with additional wall heating throughout the home. A generous carpeted master suite awaits with spacious WIR and contemporary bathroom boasting floor to ceiling tiles, oversize rain head shower, vanity and toilet. Flowing off central hallway, 3BRs all carpeted, include WIRs and ceiling fans. Natural light floods the main bathroom offering, shower, bath, vanity and separate WC. The laundry provides storage with access outdoors. The privately fenced Sun drenched back garden is ideal for safe outdoor play for children or pets. A generous outdoor space and vegetable gardens will keep those with a green thumb appeased. Wide driveway and secure OSP provides ample room for a boat/caravan and a SLUG is ideal workspace/storage. Take advantage of this perfectly positioned home with its coastal vibe and community feel. Convenient distance to shopping, medical centres, sporting facilities, schools, parklands and more. Only minutes to the water and boat ramp. With beautiful beaches and enviable lifestyle based opportunities this home is set up for easy living and enjoyment for all. Land size 585sqm approx
*Please note some images contain virtual furniture.

Address: 3 Bahloo Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Amazing opportunity in Clifton Springs
Situated in family friendly Clifton Springs, 3 Bahloo Avenue presents as the ideal home for the growing family, first home buyer, investor or downsizer. Recently updated with new carpets, new blinds, and freshly painted. Offering 4 genuine bedrooms all with BIR's, the master with a WIR and an updated ensuite. The layout is very practical, with 2 living areas, a spacious kitchen that features S/S app, 900mm gas cook top, ample bench space & storage. Set on a 585m2 block with a drive thru access to a secure rear yard and a 6 x 7.3 mt colorbond shed with power. Within close proximity to the local shopping precincts & both primary and secondary schools all of which can be easily accessed by public transport. An inspection is a must for you to fully appreciate what this home and the Bellarine Peninsula really has on offer.

Address: 3 Country Club Ave Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Your Leisure Based Lifestyle Starts Here!
If you’re looking for a fantastic family home in the ultimate leisure based location - the search is over! This newly refreshed, three bedroom home offers highly functional interior spaces integrated with fun outdoor zones, in an unbeatable location. Pack the boat, grab the golf clubs, you’re going to need them here!
-Located within an easy stroll to the Golf Club, Bowling Club and beautiful bayside beaches
-Launch the boat at the nearby boat ramp and picnic at the sensational Dell Reserve
-Immaculately landscaped gardens and lush lawns are a pleasing first impression
-The front lounge-room offers solace from the busy hub, adjacent to the spacious master suite
-Parents have plenty of space here, enjoying outlooks over the gardens and a walk in robe
-The dual access ensuite bathroom is in calming neutral tones
-Open plan kitchen and dining gifts access to a huge outdoor patio with built in bar
-Upgraded appliances and an over abundance of storage is welcomed in the timber kitchen
-A central hallway grants access to the two minor bedrooms, family bathroom and laundry
-Ceiling fans to all bedrooms, sunscreen roller blinds and built in robes are further assets
-Double sliding doors reveal a sensational living room, fantastic for growing families
-A converted double garage is set up as a rumpus room/entertainment space with yard access
-Newly installed gas ducted heating is enjoyed in the cooler months, throughout the entire home
-A split level rear yard spills off the outdoor entertaining areas, gifting children plenty of room to play
-The sealed driveway offers further off street parking with an extra space for a boat, trailer or caravan
-Enjoy the convenience of being able to walk to local schools and multiple shopping facilities
-Public transport access is close by, easing the commute into Geelong or Melbourne CBD
-Take advantage of being central to award winning wineries and eateries across the Bellarine
A wonderfully versatile family home offering an enviable indoor/outdoor lifestyle. Inspect and realise the possibilities!

Description:
BLISS ON THE BELLARINE, SPACIOUS WITH BAY VIEWS, A SHORT STROLL TO THE WATER
Meticulously maintained with a flexible floor plan, work from home or just enjoy the extra space. Downstairs has entry, open plan area with well-designed kitchen, dining and living, separate rumpus room (doors open to undercover alfresco space), two bedrooms, central bathroom, separate toilet and laundry. Upstairs the third living is superb, doors open to the balcony where the view is magical, study, master bedroom with ensuite and WIR as well as another bedroom, can be five bedrooms if you need. The garden is leafy and matured creating the perfect frame. Features include gas space heater, dishwasher, pantry, loads of storage, new floor coverings, quality fixtures and window furnishings, double garage and workshop area. In summary, No. 9 has ample space, views on both levels, fantastic sunset and a top position walk to the clubs, parklands, jetty and the Dell.
Insights: 49 other 4 bedroom house in Clifton Springs have recently been sold.
